Assess the urethra by retrograde urethrogram in case of suspected urethral trauma.
Perform a rectal examination to determine the position of the prostate.
Manage bulbous urethral injuries conservatively with a transurethral catheter.

Manage posterior urethral disruption by either:
• 
primary reconstruction;
• 
primary drainage with a suprapubic catheter alone and delayed repair;
• 
primary re-alignment with a transurethral catheter.
